title: The Druid Craft Tarot : Use the Magic of Wicca and Druidry to Guide Your Life
description: Here, for the first time, is a tarot that combines the two fundamental spiritualities of Nature - Wicca and Druidry - and reflects the explosion of interest in the western magical traditional and paganism. This is a full deck of 78 cards, each a superb work of art, with a text by prominent authors.
author: Philip Carr-Gomm; Stephanie Carr-Gomm
